review: Switched from my WDTV to this. Solid device, well made, the bluetooth remote (oh my), netflix, hulu, plex, a game. Streaming is the future, never looking back again. Well done Amazon.

review: The system works as promised. It was very easy to install and comes up immediately. My opinion it's well worth the money however, you have to pay extra for the Hulu and other sites.

review: Voice search is great but shoupd be usable in apps like YouTube or include results from HBOGO etc. Kindle to Fire TV mirroring is a little laggy and choppy and hopefully improves with software updates but I've seen worse! Besides that it's great!

review: I'm satisfied with my new Amazon Fire TV. I'm not 100% satisfied however with my Prime membership in regards to movies. In general, the crappy movies are free and the ones I want to watch are not. All in all, it's a good deal. The Prime 2-day shipping itself is awesome alone, and has never let me down. FIVE star Service.
author: Spanky
